incidents.title: Compute1 Cloud Maintenance
incidents.content:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we will perform maintenance on our cloud servers.

The maintenance work will take place on Friday, 15th of July 2022 at 10:00 (CEST) and will end at approximately 10:30 (CEST), although we will try to keep the interruption as minimal as possible.

During this time, cloud servers may be temporarily unavailable and will be shutdown via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding.

2022-07-15T08:00:00.000Z
Update

We are beginning with the maintenance now. Instances might be unavailable during this time.

2022-07-15T08:35:00.000Z
Update

Instances are currently booting and we are monitoring the process.

incidents.title: power failure at Düsseldorf site
incidents.description:
We currently have a power outage at the Düsseldorf site 

We are already working on a solution
incidents.content:
Currently, the entire city power network in Düsseldorf is disrupted. The USV systems of the data centers have taken over the power supply.

2022-06-22T15:12:00.000Z
Update

Due to the power outage, some air conditioners have failed, causing server heat issues and shutdowns. We are currently in direct contact with the datacenter to solve the problem as quickly as possible.

2022-06-22T16:35:00.000Z
Update

The air conditioning units have now been brought back up and the temperature in the cold aisle has returned to normal. We are now starting to ramp up the systems that were shut down due to the high temperature.

2022-06-22T16:50:00.000Z
Update

All systems are back up and all services are stabilizing again.

2022-06-22T17:00:00.000Z
Resolved

The problem has been resolved. All services are up and running in normal operation mode.

We apologies to our customers impacted by the consequences of the power failure.

incidents.title: network connectivity issues
incidents.description:
Due to a well-distributed DoS attack towards multiple prefixes we currently experience network stability issues for DDoS protected traffic currently routed via our external DDoS mitigation service provider. We are already working on a solution. 

We are already working on a solution
incidents.content:
Due to a well-distributed DoS attack towards multiple prefixes we currently experience network stability issues for DDoS protected traffic currently routed via our external DDoS mitigation service provider. We are already working on a solution.

2022-06-09T20:15:00.000Z
Update

The permanent DDoS protection / filter rules of our external DDoS mitigation service provider has been established for a wide amount of prefixes in order to establish regular network operation again. But we still do experience some issues for some prefixes. We are currently in direct contact with the external DDoS mitigation service provider to solve the problem as quickly as possible.

2022-06-09T21:52:00.000Z
Resolved

The problem has been resolved. All services are up and running in normal operation mode. We are still in direct contact with our external DDoS mitigation service provide in order to improve the quality of the service for the future.

We apologies to our customers impacted by the consequences of the DDoS attack.

incidents.title: network connectivity issues
incidents.description:
Due to a technical problem, there are currently limitations in the network connection.

We are already working on a solution
incidents.content:
Due to a technical problem, there are currently limitations in the network connection.

We are already working on a solution

2022-05-13T05:05:00.000Z
Update

The technical error has been fixed and the network is stabilizing again.

2022-05-13T06:30:00.000Z
Resolved

Our technicians were able to resolve the technical error and restore proper operation of the network. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
